description: This dashboard displays comprehensive Kubernetes cluster monitoring data collected from Prometheus and cAdvisor. The dashboard consists of six main sections: Network I/O pressure showing cluster-wide traffic rates, Total usage displaying aggregate CPU memory and filesystem percentages, Pods CPU usage with individual pod performance metrics, Containers CPU usage showing container-level resource consumption, Pods memory usage depicting memory consumption patterns, and Pods network I/O illustrating network traffic by pod. Each panel shows time series data with configurable time ranges. Use the Node dropdown filter to view metrics for specific nodes or all nodes combined.

panels.title: Network I/O pressure
panels.description: This section contains one time series panel that displays network traffic data aggregated across all containers on selected nodes. The panel shows bytes received as positive values and bytes transmitted as negative values measured in bytes per second over time.

panels.title: Network I/O pressure
panels.description: This time series panel depicts network traffic rates measured in bytes per second. The panel displays two data series: container network receive bytes total showing incoming traffic and container network transmit bytes total showing outgoing traffic. Data is aggregated across all containers on the selected nodes and averaged over one minute intervals.

panels.title: Total usage
panels.description: This section contains nine stat panels displaying cluster resource utilization data. Three percentage panels show cluster memory usage, cluster CPU usage, and cluster filesystem usage. Six absolute value panels display memory used and total, CPU cores used and total, and filesystem space used and total. All values are calculated by aggregating metrics across selected nodes.

panels.title: Cluster memory usage
panels.description: This stat panel displays cluster memory usage as a percentage. The panel calculates the ratio of container memory working set bytes to total machine memory bytes across selected nodes. The value represents the percentage of total cluster memory currently consumed by all containers.

panels.title: Cluster CPU usage (1m avg)
panels.description: This stat panel displays cluster CPU usage as a percentage averaged over one minute. The panel calculates the ratio of container CPU usage seconds total rate to total machine CPU cores across selected nodes. The value represents the percentage of total cluster CPU capacity currently utilized by all containers.

panels.title: Cluster filesystem usage
panels.description: This stat panel displays cluster filesystem usage as a percentage. The panel calculates the ratio of container filesystem usage bytes to container filesystem limit bytes for devices matching the pattern /dev/[sv]d[a-z][1-9] across selected nodes. The value represents the percentage of total cluster filesystem capacity currently used.

panels.title: Pods CPU usage
panels.description: This section contains one time series panel that displays CPU usage data for individual pods. The panel shows container CPU usage seconds total rate grouped by pod name for containers with non-empty images on selected nodes.

panels.title: Pods CPU usage (1m avg)
panels.description: This time series panel depicts CPU usage per pod measured in CPU cores. The panel displays container CPU usage seconds total rate aggregated by pod for containers with non-empty images on selected nodes. Each line in the chart represents one pod and shows CPU consumption over time averaged over one minute intervals.

panels.title: Pods memory usage
panels.description: This section contains one time series panel that displays memory usage data for individual pods. The panel shows container memory working set bytes aggregated by pod for containers with non-empty images on selected nodes.

panels.title: Pods memory usage
panels.description: This time series panel depicts memory usage per pod measured in bytes. The panel displays container memory working set bytes aggregated by pod for containers with non-empty images on selected nodes. Each line in the chart represents one pod and shows memory consumption over time.

panels.title: Pods network I/O
panels.description: This section contains one time series panel that displays network traffic data for individual pods. The panel shows container network receive bytes total and container network transmit bytes total rates aggregated by pod for containers with non-empty images on selected nodes.

panels.title: Pods network I/O (1m avg)
panels.description: This time series panel depicts network traffic rates per pod measured in bytes per second. The panel displays two data series: container network receive bytes total rate showing incoming traffic and container network transmit bytes total rate showing outgoing traffic. Data is aggregated by pod for containers with non-empty images on selected nodes and averaged over one minute intervals.

title: Kubernetes cluster monitoring (via Prometheus)
